sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useCart } from "../context/cart/CartState"; export default function Cart() { const { cartItems, addToCart, removeFromCart, loading } = useCart(); const totalItems = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0); const subtotal = cartItems.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + item.price * item.quantity, 0 ); const add=( item,qty)=>{ const cartItem = { productId: item.product._id, color: item.variant.color, size: item.size, image: item.variant.images, quantity: qty, price: item.price, }; addToCart(cartItem, qty); } if (loading) { return

Loading cart...

; } return (

Shopping Cart

{totalItems} items
{cartItems.length === 0 && (

Your cart is empty

)} {cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
Color: {item.variant.color}
Size: {item.size}
{/* Quantity controls */}
€ {(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
{/* Remove button */}
))} ← Back to shop
{/* Summary */}

Summary

Items ({totalItems}) € {subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping
Promo Code
Total € {(subtotal + 5).toFixed(2)}
); }
